title: Domains and Ranges of Inverse Functions
text: When finding the inverse, the domain of the inverse is the range of f and the range of this new function is the domain of f.

title: Finding Domain and Range
text: To find the domain and range of an equation $$y$$ $$=$$ f(x), determine the values $$x$$ for which the function is defined.

title: Undefined Values
text: If $$x$$ is less than this point, the function is undefined. What is this point?
